input.sentences: backyard parties are very popular during summer time .
[female] arranged a backyard party for her high school friends last weekend .
her cousin [male] was also invited along with other guests .
there were around 20 guests at [female] 's house that evening .
everyone enjoyed meeting their high school friends after a long time .
output.sentences: During this time of the Summer, a popular thing to do is to gather with friends.
This was the last weekend before school started back up, so a group of teachers got together for a party.
One male seemed to have invited himself, as he wasn't a teacher like the other guests.
The house was filled with guests at the home of a female math teacher.
This was not the time nor place to bring up school, and this meeting remained about the friendship they all shared.
